responseOptions.responseText: Adequate with or without corrective devices

questions.questionText: Resident has skin condition(s) present. Must describe below:
Resident's skin is intact, no conditions noted at this time.

Skin Conditions: Note any skin conditions using the diagram below. Under description, indicate type of condition observed: bruise, abrasion, open area, surgical incision, rash, redness, skin tear, burn, other (must describe).
Has resident had an acute illness within the last month?
Specify new diagnoses within the last month:
Resident on Restorative Nursing Program. Refer to RNP notes.
